dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT (CASE WHEN INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1) > 5 THEN 'NO' WHEN NOT LENGTH(TRIM(TRANSLATE(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4), ' +-.0123456789', ' '))) IS NULL THEN 'NO' ELSE 'YES' END) run_report FROM DUAL

SELECT TO_CHAR(acr.fiscal_period_start, 'MM/DD/YYYY') start_dt, TO_CHAR(acr.fiscal_period_end, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end_dt, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') run_dt FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(acr.job_gid) file_no1, acr.move_perspective_gid job_type1, acr.loc_code loc_code1, acr.perspective expense_income1, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.shipment_gid) shipment_no1, TO_CHAR(acr.job_billed_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') job_bill_date1, TO_CHAR(acr.bl_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date1, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.source_location_gid) origin1, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.dest_location_gid) destination1, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.servprov_gid) carrier1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.current_cost ELSE acr.current_cost END) current_cost1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_otm ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_otm END) otm_actual1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 END) as400_actual1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.accrued_cost ELSE acr.accrued_cost END) period_accrual1, acr.clearing_type clearing1 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 1 ORDER BY acr.job_gid

SELECT NVL(SUM(a.current_cost_inc1),0) current_cost_inc1, NVL(SUM(a.current_cost_exp1),0) current_cost_exp1, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_inc1),0) otm_actual_inc1, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_exp1),0) otm_actual_exp1, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_inc1),0) as400_actual_inc1, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_exp1),0) as400_actual_exp1, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_inc1),0) period_accrual_inc1, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_exp1),0) period_accrual_exp1 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.current_cost) END) current_cost_inc1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.current_cost) END) current_cost_exp1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_inc1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_exp1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_inc1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_exp1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_inc1, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_exp1 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 1 GROUP BY acr.perspective) a

SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(acr.job_gid) file_no2, acr.move_perspective_gid job_type2, acr.loc_code loc_code2, acr.perspective expense_income2, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.shipment_gid) shipment_no2, TO_CHAR(acr.job_billed_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') job_bill_date2, TO_CHAR(acr.bl_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date2, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.source_location_gid) origin2, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.dest_location_gid) destination2, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.servprov_gid) carrier2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.last_accrual_cost ELSE acr.last_accrual_cost END) last_accrual2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.cost_change ELSE acr.cost_change END) cost_change2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_otm ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_otm END) otm_actual2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 END) as400_actual2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.accrued_cost ELSE acr.accrued_cost END) period_accrual2, acr.clearing_type clearing2 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 2 ORDER BY acr.job_gid

SELECT NVL(SUM(a.last_accrual_inc2),0) last_accrual_inc2, NVL(SUM(a.last_accrual_exp2),0) last_accrual_exp2, NVL(SUM(a.cost_change_inc2),0) cost_change_inc2, NVL(SUM(a.cost_change_exp2),0) cost_change_exp2, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_inc2),0) otm_actual_inc2, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_exp2),0) otm_actual_exp2, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_inc2),0) as400_actual_inc2, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_exp2),0) as400_actual_exp2, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_inc2),0) period_accrual_inc2, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_exp2),0) period_accrual_exp2 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.last_accrual_cost) END) last_accrual_inc2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.last_accrual_cost) END) last_accrual_exp2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.cost_change) END) cost_change_inc2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.cost_change) END) cost_change_exp2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_inc2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_exp2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_inc2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_exp2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_inc2, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_exp2 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 2 GROUP BY acr.perspective) a

SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(acr.job_gid) file_no3, acr.move_perspective_gid job_type3, acr.loc_code loc_code3, acr.perspective expense_income3, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.shipment_gid) shipment_no3, TO_CHAR(acr.job_billed_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') job_bill_date3, TO_CHAR(acr.bl_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date3, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.source_location_gid) origin3, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.dest_location_gid) destination3, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.servprov_gid) carrier3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.last_accrual_cost ELSE acr.last_accrual_cost END) last_accrual3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.cost_change ELSE acr.cost_change END) cost_change3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_otm ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_otm END) otm_actual3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 END) as400_actual3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.accrued_cost ELSE acr.accrued_cost END) period_accrual3, acr.clearing_type clearing3 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 3 ORDER BY acr.job_gid

SELECT NVL(SUM(a.last_accrual_inc3),0) last_accrual_inc3, NVL(SUM(a.last_accrual_exp3),0) last_accrual_exp3, NVL(SUM(a.cost_change_inc3),0) cost_change_inc3, NVL(SUM(a.cost_change_exp3),0) cost_change_exp3, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_inc3),0) otm_actual_inc3, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_exp3),0) otm_actual_exp3, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_inc3),0) as400_actual_inc3, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_exp3),0) as400_actual_exp3, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_inc3),0) period_accrual_inc3, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_exp3),0) period_accrual_exp3 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.last_accrual_cost) END) last_accrual_inc3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.last_accrual_cost) END) last_accrual_exp3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.cost_change) END) cost_change_inc3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.cost_change) END) cost_change_exp3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_inc3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_exp3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_inc3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_exp3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_inc3, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_exp3 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 3 GROUP BY acr.perspective) a

SELECT acr.loc_code loc_code_inc123, SUM(-acr.last_accrual_cost) last_accrual_inc123, SUM(-acr.cost_change) cost_change_inc123, SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) otm_actual_inc123, SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) as400_actual_inc123, SUM(-acr.accrued_cost) period_accrual_inc123 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number IN (1,2,3) AND acr.perspective = 'S' GROUP BY acr.loc_code ORDER BY acr.loc_code

SELECT NVL(SUM(-acr.last_accrual_cost),0) last_accrual_inc123t, NVL(SUM(-acr.cost_change),0) cost_change_inc123t, NVL(SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_otm),0) otm_actual_inc123t, NVL(SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_as400),0) as400_actual_inc123t, NVL(SUM(-acr.accrued_cost),0) period_accrual_inc123t FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number IN (1,2,3) AND acr.perspective = 'S'

SELECT acr.loc_code loc_code_exp123, SUM(acr.last_accrual_cost) last_accrual_exp123, SUM(acr.cost_change) cost_change_exp123, SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) otm_actual_exp123, SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) as400_actual_exp123, SUM(acr.accrued_cost) period_accrual_exp123 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number IN (1,2,3) AND acr.perspective = 'B' GROUP BY acr.loc_code ORDER BY acr.loc_code

SELECT NVL(SUM(acr.last_accrual_cost),0) last_accrual_exp123t, NVL(SUM(acr.cost_change),0) cost_change_exp123t, NVL(SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_otm),0) otm_actual_exp123t, NVL(SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_as400),0) as400_actual_exp123t, NVL(SUM(acr.accrued_cost),0) period_accrual_exp123t FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number IN (1,2,3) AND acr.perspective = 'B'

SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(acr.job_gid) file_no4, acr.move_perspective_gid job_type4, acr.loc_code loc_code4, acr.perspective expense_income4, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.shipment_gid) shipment_no4, TO_CHAR(acr.job_billed_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') job_bill_date4, TO_CHAR(acr.bl_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date4, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.source_location_gid) origin4, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.dest_location_gid) destination4, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.servprov_gid) carrier4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.current_cost ELSE acr.current_cost END) current_cost4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_otm ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_otm END) otm_actual4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 END) as400_actual4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.accrued_cost ELSE acr.accrued_cost END) period_accrual4, acr.clearing_type clearing4 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 4 ORDER BY acr.job_gid

SELECT NVL(SUM(a.current_cost_inc4),0) current_cost_inc4, NVL(SUM(a.current_cost_exp4),0) current_cost_exp4, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_inc4),0) otm_actual_inc4, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_exp4),0) otm_actual_exp4, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_inc4),0) as400_actual_inc4, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_exp4),0) as400_actual_exp4, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_inc4),0) period_accrual_inc4, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_exp4),0) period_accrual_exp4 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.current_cost) END) current_cost_inc4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.current_cost) END) current_cost_exp4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_inc4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_exp4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_inc4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_exp4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_inc4, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_exp4 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 4 GROUP BY acr.perspective) a

SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(acr.job_gid) file_no5, acr.move_perspective_gid job_type5, acr.loc_code loc_code5, acr.perspective expense_income5, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.shipment_gid) shipment_no5, TO_CHAR(acr.job_billed_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') job_bill_date5, TO_CHAR(acr.bl_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date5, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.source_location_gid) origin5, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.dest_location_gid) destination5, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.servprov_gid) carrier5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.last_accrual_cost ELSE acr.last_accrual_cost END) last_accrual5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.cost_change ELSE acr.cost_change END) cost_change5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_otm ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_otm END) otm_actual5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 END) as400_actual5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.accrued_cost ELSE acr.accrued_cost END) period_accrual5, acr.clearing_type clearing5 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 5 ORDER BY acr.job_gid

SELECT NVL(SUM(a.last_accrual_inc5),0) last_accrual_inc5, NVL(SUM(a.last_accrual_exp5),0) last_accrual_exp5, NVL(SUM(a.cost_change_inc5),0) cost_change_inc5, NVL(SUM(a.cost_change_exp5),0) cost_change_exp5, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_inc5),0) otm_actual_inc5, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_exp5),0) otm_actual_exp5, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_inc5),0) as400_actual_inc5, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_exp5),0) as400_actual_exp5, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_inc5),0) period_accrual_inc5, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_exp5),0) period_accrual_exp5 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.last_accrual_cost) END) last_accrual_inc5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.last_accrual_cost) END) last_accrual_exp5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.cost_change) END) cost_change_inc5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.cost_change) END) cost_change_exp5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_inc5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_exp5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_inc5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_exp5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_inc5, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_exp5 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 5 GROUP BY acr.perspective) a

SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(acr.job_gid) file_no6, acr.move_perspective_gid job_type6, acr.loc_code loc_code6, acr.perspective expense_income6, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.shipment_gid) shipment_no6, TO_CHAR(acr.job_billed_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') job_bill_date6, TO_CHAR(acr.bl_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date6, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.source_location_gid) origin6, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.dest_location_gid) destination6, glog_util.remove_domain(acr.servprov_gid) carrier6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.last_accrual_cost ELSE acr.last_accrual_cost END) last_accrual6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.cost_change ELSE acr.cost_change END) cost_change6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_otm ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_otm END) otm_actual6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 ELSE acr.inv_appr_cost_as400 END) as400_actual6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN -acr.accrued_cost ELSE acr.accrued_cost END) period_accrual6, acr.clearing_type clearing6 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 6 ORDER BY acr.job_gid

SELECT NVL(SUM(a.last_accrual_inc6),0) last_accrual_inc6, NVL(SUM(a.last_accrual_exp6),0) last_accrual_exp6, NVL(SUM(a.cost_change_inc6),0) cost_change_inc6, NVL(SUM(a.cost_change_exp6),0) cost_change_exp6, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_inc6),0) otm_actual_inc6, NVL(SUM(a.otm_actual_exp6),0) otm_actual_exp6, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_inc6),0) as400_actual_inc6, NVL(SUM(a.as400_actual_exp6),0) as400_actual_exp6, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_inc6),0) period_accrual_inc6, NVL(SUM(a.period_accrual_exp6),0) period_accrual_exp6 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.last_accrual_cost) END) last_accrual_inc6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.last_accrual_cost) END) last_accrual_exp6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.cost_change) END) cost_change_inc6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.cost_change) END) cost_change_exp6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_inc6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_otm) END) otm_actual_exp6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_inc6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.inv_appr_cost_as400) END) as400_actual_exp6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'S' THEN SUM(-acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_inc6, (CASE WHEN acr.perspective = 'B' THEN SUM(acr.accrued_cost) END) period_accrual_exp6 FROM glogowner.xxscou_accrual_rpt acr WHERE acr.fiscal_year = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),0,4)) AND acr.fiscal_period_number = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),INSTR(glog_util.remove_domain(TRIM(:P_PERIOD)),'x',1,1)+1,100)) AND acr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND acr.section_number = 6 GROUP BY acr.perspective) a
